text: David Hoyt Canary (August 25, 1938 â€“ November 16, 2015) was an American movie and television actor. He was best known for his roles as Adam and Stuart Chandler in All My Children and as Candy Canady in Bonanza. He was born in Elwood, Indiana. Canary died from complications of Alzheimer's disease in Wilton, Connecticut at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Indiana
title: David Canary
